txt.en: 'Tapestries tell tales of old. The finest silk threads feel cool against the skin in the hot sun. Linens and leathers protect us from the elements and worse. What would Umbar Baharbêl be without the tailor's guild? A mass of unwashed and unclothed fools. I joke of course. But, there is a measure of truth to our role in maintaining the needs of all Umbar's people.\n\n'Will you help us with requests coming from the many patrons in the city?'
Craft a crate of woven armour for the Umbar Tailor's Guild
The tailor's guild in Umbar Baharbêl supplies clothing and historical tapestries throughout the city. You are doing your part to aid them.
Deliver a crate of woven armour to the Umbar Tailor's Guild Leader
Crated a crate of woven armour for the Umbar Tailor's Guild
Provide the crate of woven armour to the Umbar Tailor's Guild Leader.
'Most excellent. These robes will be available throughout the city to any with Tami to pay for them.'
The recipe needed to complete this quest is available for purchase. <rgb=#00f000>Purchase the quest recipe from the guild leader.</rgb>\n\nPackage a crate of woven armour.
